thread.title: David Ortiz gives fans a glimpse at his new spring training
thread.title_full: David Ortiz gives fans a glimpse at his new spring training

title: David Ortiz gives fans a glimpse at his new spring training
text:
Spring training has a much different feel these days for David Ortiz. Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports 
David Ortiz seems to be enjoying his retirement. 
While the rest of the Boston Red Sox are gathered in Fort Myers, Fla., for the beginning of spring training, the former designated hitter reported to the beach and shared a look at his new spring training via Twitter. My spring training  pic.twitter.com/6efcdohjlJ — David Ortiz (@davidortiz) February 19, 2017 
Although Ortiz claims it’s “so good to be retired,” that hasn’t kept his name from coming up frequently at Red Sox camp. 
And if the legendary slugger decides to change his mind, he doesn’t appear to be too far from his old mates. A post shared by David Ortiz (@davidortiz) on Feb 18, 2017 at 4:29pm PST 
The reality of a Red Sox team without Ortiz is starting to set in as the 2017 season approaches. 
This article first appeared on NESN.com and was syndicated with permission.
